title: WolfingtonDad1.1
body: Thank you for agreeing to meet privately with me. [[Answer:Player1.2|Player1.2]] [[Answer:Player1.3a|Player1.3a]]

title: Player1.2
body: I'll always make time for an ol' crook like you. [[Answer:Wolfington2.1|Wolfington2.0]]

title: Player1.3a
body: Well, it was easier than a warrant. [[Answer:Node|Player1.3b]]

title: Player1.3b
body: Plus it was less likely to get me shot. [[Answer:Wolfington2.1|Wolfington2.0]]

title: Wolfington2.0
body: Jimmy, I assure you. My hands are clean on this one. [[Answer:Player2.2a|Player2.2a]] [[Answer:Player2.1a|Player2.1a]]

title: Player2.2a
body: You aren't the only werewolf in town anymore, Lloyd. [[Answer:Wolfington2.2b|Wolfington2.2b]]

title: Player2.1a
body: Yours may be, but what about your boys? [[Answer:Wolfington3.0|Wolfington3.0b]]<reqVar>wolfSuspect 1</reqVar>

title: Wolfington2.2b
body: Are you talking about Lleroy?*[i]laughs[/i]* [[Answer:Wolfington2.2c|Wolfington2.2c]]

title: Wolfington2.2c
body: *[i]continues laughing[/i]* Him? His werewolf form would lose a fight to a Shih Tzu. [[Answer:Wolfington2.2d|Wolfington2.2d]]

title: Wolfington2.2d
body: Hell, even his damn name has a stutter. [[Answer:PlayerEnd01|PlayerEnd2.2]] [[Answer:Player3.1a|Player3.0a]]<clue>Lleroy Wolfington, the youngest of the three brothers, 9 years younger than the twins, is a sad excuse for the werewolf.</clue><clue><It definitely wasn't Lleroy</clue>

title: PlayerEnd2.2
body: I'm onto you, you sick fuck.

title: Player3.0a
body: I meant Don and Jon and you know it. [[Answer:Wolfington3.0|Wolfington3.0b]]<reqVar>wolfSuspect 1</reqVar>

title: Wolfington3.0b
body: Them? They're not werewolves. [[Answer:Wolfington3.0b|Wolfington3.0c]]

title: Wolfington3.0c
body: Nope, just me. Definitely no other true werewolves in the family, [[Answer:Wolfington3.0c|Wolfington3.0d]]

title: Wolfington3.0d
body: And I can't even turn lupine without the help of Werewolf Viagra™!<clue>Werewolf Viagra. Gross</clue> [[Answer:Wolfington3.0d|Wolfington3.0e]]<cngVar>hateBoss 10</cngVar>

title: Wolfington3.0e
body: From the makers of Viagra™, it's Werewolf Viagra™. To keep you howling all night long. [[Answer:Player3.1a|Player3.1a]] [[Answer:Player3.2a|Player3.2a]]

title: Player3.1a
body: Stop changing the subject. [[Answer:Player3.Xb|Player3.Xb]]

title: Player3.2a
body: Justice will prevail, Mr. Wolfington. [[Answer:Player3.Xb|Player3.Xb]]

title: Player3.Xb
body: One of your sons is guilty. I know it. [[Answer:Wolfington3.2a|Wolfington3.2a]]

title: Wolfington3.2a
body: If you even get near my family... [[Answer:WolfingtonEnd3.2|Wolfington3.2b]]

title: Wolfington3.2b
body: I'll bury you in so many lawsuits that your grandchildren go bankrupt from the lawyers fees. [[Answer:PlayerEnd4.1|PlayerEnd4.1]] [[Answer:PlayerEnd4.2|PlayerEnd4.2]]

title: PlayerEnd4.1
body: Sure, that's what an innocent person says.

title: PlayerEnd4.2
body: If I had kids or money, maybe that would scare me.
